review_data.title: Fun, friendly & Delicious
review_data.content: Fun Spot! We stopped here as part of a chocolate tasting tour and it was great! We had so much fun interacting with the owner, tasting chocolate and had the BEST Amaretto Hot Chocolate!

review_data.title: Feine Schokolade und Macarons
review_data.content: Farbenfrohe und feine Auswahl von Macarons zu einem feinen Cafe Eine aussergewöhnliche und persönliche Geschenk-Idee: per Computer können Sie die...More

review_data.title: Magnifique!
review_data.content: A ne rater sous aucun prétexte ! Les glaces sont absolument succulentes; chocolat-banane !!un rêve. Un peu chérot, mais la...More

review_data.title: Not bad at all
review_data.content: Walked pass and spotted the gelato so why not at all. The dark choc one is nice and really dark. Pistachio is packed with flavour too. Gluey gelato indeed.
